@graph.caption: A slice of strawberry ice cream loaf being held towards the camera

@graph.name: Strawberry Ice cream Loaf! - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: A strawberry ice cream loaf. A fun bread loaf with a delicious strawberry taste when toasted. Enjoy with tea or coffee. Vegan Recipe.

@graph.name: Strawberry Ice Cream Loaf
@graph.description: A strawberry ice cream loaf. A fun bread loaf with a delicious strawberry taste when toasted. Enjoy with tea or coffee. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 7-8 tablespoons vegan strawberry ice cream ((more for a sweeter bread))

recipeInstructions.text: Add the yeast and sugar to 1/4 cup warm water and mix well. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the yeast and sugar to 1/4 cup warm water and mix well. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, dry blend the flax seeds and oats . You can use flaxseed meal as well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, dry blend the flax seeds and oats . You can use flaxseed meal as well.

recipeInstructions.text: In the mixer bowl add the flours, salt and the oats and flaxseed and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: In the mixer bowl add the flours, salt and the oats and flaxseed and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast mixture, softened butter, strawberry icecream and half cup warm water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast mixture, softened butter, strawberry icecream and half cup warm water.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead the dough for 8-10 minutes, scraping sides every 2-3 minutes. add more flour or water in little quantities if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead the dough for 8-10 minutes, scraping sides every 2-3 minutes. add more flour or water in little quantities if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Spritz the top of dough with some oil spray. Place dough in a covered container in a warm place for 1.5 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Spritz the top of dough with some oil spray. Place dough in a covered container in a warm place for 1.5 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch it lightly and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides, or by rolling it out into a rectangle and rolling the rectangle from one side and tucking the other edge under.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch it lightly and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides, or by rolling it out into a rectangle and rolling the rectangle from one side and tucking the other edge under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in greased bread pan. Spritz the top with a little oil spray and cover with damp towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in greased bread pan. Spritz the top with a little oil spray and cover with damp towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Place it in a warm place or warm oven for about an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place it in a warm place or warm oven for about an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove towel, spritz top with some water and bake at 375 degrees F for 40-45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove towel, spritz top with some water and bake at 375 degrees F for 40-45 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove bread from pan and let cool for atleast an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove bread from pan and let cool for atleast an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: I usually refrigerate it for another hour before slicing. The breads are usually quite fluffy and soft and refrigeration makes them a bit firm for nice and clean slices!
recipeInstructions.name: I usually refrigerate it for another hour before slicing. The breads are usually quite fluffy and soft and refrigeration makes them a bit firm for nice and clean slices!

@graph.keywords: flavored bread, fruit bread, sweet bread
